sect1.title: Acknowledgments
sect1.para: We would like to thank the following people et organizations for their contributions toward the BLFS et LFS projects:

listitem.para: Mark Stone <mstone@linux.com> for donating the linuxfromscratch.org servers.
VA Linux Systems for providing rackspace et bandwidth for the linuxfromscratch.org server.
Gerard Beekmans <gerard@linuxfromscratch.org> for starting et writing the vast majority of the LFS project.

Jesse Tie-Ten-Quee <highos@linuxfromscratch.org> for answering many questions on irc, having a great deal of patience et for not killing the current editor for the joke in the original BLFS announcement!
DREAMWVR.COM for their ongoing sponsorship by donating various resources to the LFS et related sub projects.
Robert Briggs for donating the linuxfromscratch.org et linuxfromscratch.com domain names.
Frank Skettino <bkenoah@oswd.org> at OSWD for coming up the initial design of the LFS et BLFS websites.
Garrett LeSage <garrett@linux.com> for creating the LFS banner
Countless other people on the various LFS et BLFS mailinglists who are making this book happen by giving their suggestions, testing the book et submitting bug reports.
